name: Dog Travel Carrier Bag
imageAlt: Airline-approved soft-sided dog travel carrier bag with mesh ventilation panels
shortDescription: A comfortable, airline-approved carrier that makes travelling with your dog stress-free.
description: Whether you are taking a Grab to the vet or catching a flight for the holidays, this soft-sided carrier keeps your dog safe and comfortable on the go. Mesh ventilation panels on three sides provide airflow and visibility, while the padded base gives your pup a cosy spot to settle in. Fits under most airline seats and meets cabin carry-on requirements.
features: Meets airline cabin carry-on requirements for most carriers
Three-sided mesh ventilation for maximum airflow and visibility
Padded, removable base insert is machine-washable
Top and side openings for easy loading and access
